fields.name: Whipped Man Body Butter
fields.description: Our Whipped Man Body Butter is a miracle product on rough skin. It is softening, moisturising, easily absorbed into the skin wihtout leaving a greasy residue and is suitable for most skin types." Fragranced with Neroli, Cedarwood and Sandalwood essential oils, our Whipped Man Butter soothes, nourishes and enhances the complexion.

fields.name: Whipped Vanilla Body Butter
fields.description: Our Whipped Vanilla Body Butter is softening, moisturising, easily absorbed into the skin without leaving a greasy residue and is suitable for most skin types. Delicately scented using distilled vanilla extract from high grade Madagascan Vanilla Pods, our hand whipped Vanilla Body Butter gives off a subtle, sweet and creamy vanilla aroma that lingers on the skin but is not too overpowering and is currently our #1 Bestseller.

fields.name: Whipped Baby Body Butter
fields.description: Our Whipped Baby Body Butter is nourishing, softening and easily absorbed into the skin without leaving a greasy residue. Suitable for all skin types including sensitive skin and infants under 3 years. The perfect gift for expecting mothers!

fields.name: Whipped Vanilla Latte Body Butter
fields.description: Our Whipped Vanilla Latte Body Butter smells like a deliciously warm drink on a cold winter morning. It is super hydrating, easily absorbed into the skin and leaves the skin with a healthy glow." Delicately scented using distilled extracts from high grade Madagascan Vanilla Pods and Arabica Coffee Beans, our hand Whipped Vanilla Latte Body Butter gives off a subtle, sweet and creamy coffee aroma that lingers on the skin but is not too overpowering.
